prompt: Enter the correct numbers in the matrix:

match.nan: You must input a number for all cells.
match.row0wrong: Row 1 is incorrect. Make sure that each equation is made using KCL. Therefore every equation should be of the form: (current flowing into the node) = (current flowing out of the node)
match.row1wrong: Row 2 is incorrect. Make sure that each equation is made using KCL. Therefore every equation should be of the form: (current flowing into the node) = (current flowing out of the node)
match.row2wrong: Row 3 is incorrect. Make sure that each equation is made using KCL. Therefore every equation should be of the form: (current flowing into the node) = (current flowing out of the node)
match.row3wrong: Row 4 is incorrect. Make sure that each equation is made using KCL. Therefore every equation should be of the form: (current flowing into the node) = (current flowing out of the node)
